videos.description: Anushka Neyol is a young seventh generation farmer from India's wheat basket of Punjab. Anushka decided to marry her education in business management and economics with her passion for farming, launching a farm business that grows and sells nearly 20 different varieties of heirloom wheats that we've forgotten. Listen to her life story of accidentally turning a wheat nerd and the journey as a self-taught farmpreneur. Contents of video --- 0:00 Intro 1:40 Finding a farm idea 3:30 Black wheat 4:38
